## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# Build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
[Ll]ogs/
[Tt]est[Rr]esult*/
*.log
*.tlog
*.vspscc
*.vssscc

# User-specific files
*.user
*.userosscache
*.suo
*.sln.docstates
*.userprefs

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/*
!.vscode/settings.json
!.vscode/tasks.json
!.vscode/launch.json
!.vscode/extensions.json

# Visual Studio for Mac
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Rider
.idea/

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
*.nuspec
packages/
*.psmdcp
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json

# .NET Core build
project.assets.json
artifacts/

# Publish output
publish/
out/

# Tye
.tye/

# Coverage & testing
*.coverage
*.coveragexml
coverage-report/
TestResults/

# Others
*.dbmdl
*.bak
*.backup
*.BLOB
*.sqlite
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Azure build output
csx/
*.build.csdef
ecf/
rcf/

# Windows
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# macOS
.DS_Store
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride

# Linux
*~

# Node (for front-end parts of ASP.NET projects)
node_modules/
npm-debug.log
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Dotnet tools
.dotnet/
global.json
